info.name: Crow
info.attribution:
The room layout, game design, and card designs are by LawDawg96 and released to the Public Domain by CC0. The following graphics are from Pixabay and are available under the Pixabay license.
- Card back: https://pixabay.com/photos/raven-crow-bird-black-bird-avian-5588641/ - Rook card: https://pixabay.com/vectors/animal-bird-black-crow-raven-2025562/

Library image generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "crow at sunset oil on canvas --ar 1:1 --v 5.1"
info.description: Classic trick taking card game using 4 suited deck with cards 1-14 and a bird card.

fields.text: Do you want to start the next hand?

n7n1.text: Choose cards to discard (if any) and drag to trash icon. Once removed, they cannot be added back unless you reload the game. Then press play to begin.
